g++   -O2 -g    CMakeFiles/xtask.dir/initUserTasks.c.o CMakeFiles/xtask.dir/sample_task.c.o CMakeFiles/xtask.dir/sample_task_cpp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xtask.dir/vision_calibration_task.c.o CMakeFiles/xtask.dir/sample_trigger.c.o  -o xtask -rdynamic -L/usr/X11/lib64 -L/usr/X11/lib -L/Network/Servers/duerer/Volumes/duerer/guest/prog/lib/x86_64 -L/Network/Servers/duerer/Volumes/duerer/clmc/prog/lib/x86_64 -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.5.3 -lSLtask -lSLcommon -lmaster_task -lmaster -lutility -lpthread -lrt -ledit -lcurses -lnsl -lglut -lGL -lGLU -lX11 -lXmu -lm -Wl,-rpath,/usr/X11/lib64:/usr/X11/lib:/Network/Servers/duerer/Volumes/duerer/guest/prog/lib/x86_64:/Network/Servers/duerer/Volumes/duerer/clmc/prog/lib/x86_64
